size.description: Radio group size, valid only for Radio in the form of a button or Radio with a border
size.description_zh: 单选框组尺寸，仅对按钮形式的 Radio 或带有边框的 Radio 有效

text-color.description: The color of the text when Radio is activated in the form of a button
text-color.description_zh: 按钮形式的 Radio 激活时的文本颜色

fill.description: The fill color and border color of Radio in the form of a button
fill.description_zh: 按钮形式的 Radio 激活时的填充色和边框色

events.name: input
events.description: An event that is triggered when the binding value changes
events.params: 选中的 Radio label 值
events.description_zh: 绑定值变化时触发的事件
